animal.question: I meow and love to play. I like to chase string all day. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk
🐈‍⬛ Some people think black ones bring bad luck
🧶 I like to play with yarn.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to fetch and never fail. What am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like playing in the park.
🏡 I am a man's best friend.

animal.question: I say 'Moo' and give you milk. I like to eat grass. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I live on a farm.
⚫ I have black and white spots.
🔔 Some people put a bell around my neck.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. My babies are fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: 🧡 I have orange feet.
🌧️ I don't mind the rain!
🥚 I lay eggs.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love peanuts. What am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I love to eat peanuts.
🌍 I live in Africa or Asia.
🐘 I am the largest land animal.

animal.question: I hop around and love to eat carrots. I have long ears and a twitching nose. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I love to eat carrots.
🐇 I am known for my fluffy tail.
🌱 I like to eat garden vegetables.

animal.question: I roar and have a big mane. I am the king of the jungle. What am I?

hints.text: 👑 I'm known as the king of the jungle
🍖 I like to eat meat.
🦁 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I slither and hiss and have no legs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I shed my skin
🚫 I have no legs.
🌱 I can live in a jungle or a desert.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes and run fast. I look like a horse. What am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I am black and white.
🌍 I live in Africa.
🐎 I look like a horse.

animal.question: I'm a tall animal with a very long neck, eating leaves is how I stay alive. What am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I have spots.
🌳 I like to eat leaves from tall trees.
🌍 I live in Africa.

transport.question: I have wheels and go beep beep! What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I'm often red, blue, or yellow.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry you and your family.
🚦 I stop at stop signs.

transport.question: I float on water and help you cross a lake. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
🚣 You might need oars to make me go.
⚓ I can be big or small, with sails or a motor.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I have wings.
✈️ I fly very high.
🌎 You can travel to different countries in me.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry lots of people at once. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I make a 'choo choo' sound.
🚝 I run on metal rails.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people ride me to school or work.

transport.question: I help you ride up and down the street with just two wheels and pedals.

hints.text: 🧑‍🦽 You need to balance.
⚙️ You use your feet to move me.
🔔 I might have a bell you can ring.

transport.question: I’m big and yellow, and I take children to school every day.

hints.text: 🚦 I have flashing lights.
✋ Children wait for me at the curb.
🛑 I stop to pick up children.

transport.question: I have a motor and can go very fast on water. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I create a wave behind me.
⛵ I don't need wind to move.
🛥️ I'm smaller than a cruise ship, bigger than a kayak.

transport.question: I carry things and have a big bed in the back. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I'm used to move furniture.
🧰 I often have a tool box.
🚚 I'm not as big as a semi-trailer, but bigger than a car.

transport.question: I fly in the sky, and I can turn around really fast, and sometimes I have a loud siren.

hints.text: 🚁 My blades spin around on top.
🚑 I can help people who are hurt.
🚨 I don't need a runway to take off.

transport.question: I take people under the city without using roads. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I often have many stops underground.
🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Many people ride me during rush hour.
💡 You might use a map to find your way on me.
